Comment 3: 
the problem does go away with GOGC=off, but it's so sensitive that
that that doesn't necessarily pin it down to the gc.

currently i can only get the problem by running outside
gdb - as soon as i try to run inside gdb, it doesn't crash.

earlier today it was crashing inside gdb, but behaviour has
changed since i rebuilt with a resynchronised source tree.

also, it now only crashes with -debug; previously it only
crashed *without* -debug.

i tried to get it to dump core (ulimit -c 1000000000), but failed,
i don't know why.
